text:
Hey all! *We want there to be more eyes and clicks on your job postings*, so this month we're trying an experiment - we've posted a central thread on the HubSpot community forum where you can highlight you're hiring! We'll Tweet out this link as well as include it in the monthly developer newsletter so it will get a bit more exposure during the month.

*What can you do?* 
• Go post your job opening there, too. You're welcome to reply on the forum thread with a link to an external listing, but you can also create a free(!) listing on the job listing part of the community and reply with a link to that. 
• We're looking for HS-specific developer / architect / technical positions only. 
• Not hiring or looking? Share and upvote the thread to help fill those jobs faster :slightly_smiling_face: 
*May's forum thread*: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/HubSpot-Developer-Jobs-in-May/m-p/627210#M852>

_edited to add: Feel free to continue posting here on #Jobs, this is just another opportunity!_
